name: Missing (itch) (aemeny)
description:
This game was made as part of a BU yr2/GSP Game Jam!

We had a time limit of 48 hours in a 5-person team with them theme Law.

In our game, you play as a detective in an oblique or Top-Down view where you have to explore the house you were kept captive in, solving puzzles as you go to progress, where eventually you find yourself in the woods being stalked by a demon as you try to find a way to stop the cultists from letting the monster loose on the world.

As this game was made in 2 days there are many known issues and bugs:

-Player moving back through scenes puts them at the start instead of where they came from

-Some puzzles don't save after reloading a scene

-No clear indication for when pieces of the key are collected

-No indication to when the player picks up the cross from the body to put in the alter

-Options Menu not active

Controls:

-Movement - WASD

-Interaction - E

-Torch - F

-Puzzles - LMB - Space for block falling puzzle
